sentences.en: Coping with severe drops in temperature can be very difficult.
sentences.cn: 温度大幅下降可能会很难应付。

sentences.en: If your child's temperature rises, sponge her down gently with tepid water.
sentences.cn: 如果你孩子的体温上升，就用海绵蘸上温水轻轻地擦拭她的身体。

sentences.en: Pain-killers are very useful in small amounts to bring your temperature down.
sentences.cn: 小剂量的止痛药对于降低体温非常有用。

sentences.en: Serve the cake warm or at room temperature, cut in squares.
sentences.cn: 等蛋糕温热或凉至室温时切成四方块端上桌。

sentences.en: She was admitted to hospital with a soaring temperature.
sentences.cn: 她因发高烧被送进医院。

sentences.en: Temperature records have unequivocally confirmed the existence of global warming.
sentences.cn: 气温记录清楚无疑地证实了全球气候正在变暖。

sentences.en: The chocolate is then melted down to exactly the right temperature.
sentences.cn: 然后巧克力被熔化到了恰好的温度。

sentences.en: The number at the bottom is the recommended water temperature in Centigrade.
sentences.cn: 底部的数字就是推荐的摄氏水温。

sentences.en: The nurse took (= measured ) my temperature .
The roads are built to accommodate gradual temperature changes.
sentences.cn: 修建这些道路时考虑到了温度的逐渐变化。

sentences.en: The star's surface temperature is reckoned to be minus 75 degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 这颗恒星的表面温度估计在零下75摄氏度左右。

sentences.en: The temperature in the car was misting the window.
sentences.cn: 车内的热气使车窗蒙上了一层雾。

sentences.en: The temperature in the south will soar into the hundreds.
sentences.cn: 南方的温度会上升到一百多度。

sentences.en: The temperature of the water was just right for swimming.
The temperature remained below freezing point throughout the day.
sentences.cn: 一整天气温都在零度以下。

sentences.en: There have always been slight oscillations in world temperature.
sentences.cn: 全球气温一直在轻微波动。

sentences.en: These plants must be stored in the light at above freezing temperature.
sentences.cn: 这些植物必须放置于零度以上光照充足的地方。

sentences.en: Water boils at a temperature of 100˚C.

words.tran_cn: 温和的；适度的；有节制的

phrases.tran_cn: 环境温度；室温；周围温度
表面温度；地表温度；表层水温
温度测量，测温；水温测定

trans.tran_en: a measure of how hot or cold a place or thing is
